trans-unit.source: Provides event data for the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CreateVerbs" /> event that is used by the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.OnCreateVerbs(System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbsEventArgs)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: Proporciona datos de evento para el evento <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CreateVerbs" /> que utiliza el método <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.OnCreateVerbs(System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbsEventArgs)" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbsEventArgs> class represents the event data for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CreateVerbs> event, which occurs when the Web Parts verbs are created for a zone that derives from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> class.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbsEventArgs> clase representa los datos del evento para el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CreateVerbs> evento, que se produce cuando se crean los verbos de elementos Web para una zona que se deriva de la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> clase.

trans-unit.source: Web Parts verbs represent actions that users can perform in the user interface (UI) of a Web Parts page, such as minimizing, closing, or restoring controls; adding controls to a page; or canceling an action.
trans-unit.target: Verbos de los elementos Web representan acciones que los usuarios pueden realizar en la interfaz de usuario (UI) de una página de elementos Web, como minimizar, cerrar o restaurar controles; Agregar controles a una página; o cancelar una acción.

trans-unit.source: Verbs can appear in both the header and footer areas of a zone, and there are both standard verbs provided with the Web Parts control set, and custom verbs that can be added by developers.
trans-unit.target: Los verbos pueden aparecer en el encabezado y el pie de página áreas de una zona, y hay verbos estándar proporcionados con el conjunto de controles de elementos Web y verbos personalizados que se pueden agregar los desarrolladores.

trans-unit.source: A verb is represented in the UI by a clickable object, which you can set to appear as a hyperlink, an image, or a button, by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.VerbButtonType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Un verbo se representa en la interfaz de usuario mediante un objeto interactivo, que se puede establecer para que aparezca como un hipervínculo, una imagen o un botón, por mediante el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.VerbButtonType%2A> propiedad.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> zone provides a standard set of verbs that get rendered in a Web Parts control's verbs menu.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> zona proporciona un conjunto estándar de verbos que se representan en el menú de verbos de un control de elementos Web.

trans-unit.source: A custom Web Parts zone, or a Web Parts control inside a Web Parts zone, can add additional verbs to the menu.
trans-unit.target: Una zona de elementos Web personalizada o un control de elementos Web dentro de una zona de elementos Web, puede agregar verbos adicionales al menú.

trans-unit.source: A control in a Web Parts zone can add verbs to the control's verbs menu by inheriting from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> base class and overriding the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Un control en una zona de elementos Web puede agregar verbos al menú de verbos del control heredando de la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> base clase e invalidar el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A> propiedad.

trans-unit.source: If the control does not inherit from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> base class, you can add a new verb by implementing the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable> interface, and then overriding the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable.Verbs%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Si el control no hereda de la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> base (clase), puede agregar un nuevo verbo implementando la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable> interfaz y, a continuación, reemplazar el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable.Verbs%2A> colección.

trans-unit.source: The protected <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.OnCreateVerbs%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method allows derived classes to override the event without attaching a delegate to it.
trans-unit.target: Protegido <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.OnCreateVerbs%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método permite que las clases derivadas reemplacen el evento sin adjuntar ningún delegado a él.

trans-unit.source: A derived class must always call the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.OnCreateVerbs%2A> method of the base class to ensure that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: Una clase derivada siempre debe llamar a la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.OnCreateVerbs%2A> método de la clase base para asegurarse de que los delegados registrados reciban el evento.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbsEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbsEventArgs" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbsEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbsEventArgs" />.

trans-unit.source: This is the default constructor and it creates an empty object.
trans-unit.target: Éste es el constructor predeterminado y crea un objeto vacío.

trans-unit.source: A Web Parts verb collection.
trans-unit.target: Colección de verbos de elementos Web.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbsEventArgs" /> class using the specified Web Parts verb collection.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbsEventArgs" /> utilizando la colección de verbos de elementos Web especificada.

trans-unit.source: When using this constructor, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbsEventArgs.Verbs%2A> property is set to the Web Parts verb collection specified in the `verbs` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Cuando se utiliza este constructor, el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbsEventArgs.Verbs%2A> propiedad se establece en la colección de verbos de elementos Web especificada en el `verbs` parámetro.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the Web Parts verbs used in the event data.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece los verbos de elementos Web que se utilizan en los datos de los eventos.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: Initially, this property is set by specifying a Web Parts verb collection in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbsEventArgs.%23ctor%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection%29> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Inicialmente, esta propiedad se establece mediante la especificación de una colección de verbos de elementos Web en el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbsEventArgs.%23ctor%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection%29> constructor.
